text: went there to had my bike sprayed. push in and out total 2 times and didn't even do a gd job. screws missing here and there inside out of the bike. in the end uncle Ken did a partial refund for me.
Friendly uncle who is known for painting. Got my tank resprayed here and he did a good job for the price.

Dishonest, sold me a flat battery. Should have suspected something was off when he had to charge battery before selling it to me.

Refused an exchange when I complained. I will chalk it up to experience, but to anyone that's reading.. avoid this place!
Friendly and chatty boss (Ken) who will give you their best option based on your budget and needs. No hard sale.

Long time motorcycle painter.
Bike shops sent their bikes here for painting before it's bring put out for sale
